SERVICES /

STUDIO RECORDING

STUDIO RECORDING - IN PERSON, $30/HR

When recording at our studio in Santa Cruz, our first priority is always your artistic expression. We’ll handle the technical stuff, so you can focus on what you do best. Need your recordings mixed or mastered after the session? We’ll offer you a 20% discount on our mixing & mastering services (valid for all Ikaika Records studio recordings).

RECORDING EQUIPMENT

  • COMPUTER
    • Mac Studio
  • MONITORING
    • Main Monitors
      • 2x Yamaha HS8 Studio Monitors
      • 2x T10S Studio Subwoofers
      • Digitally tuned using Sonarworks Sound ID Reference
    • Reference Monitors
      • 2x Avantone MixCubes (Active)
      • Digitally tuned using Sonarworks SoundID Reference
  • AUDIO INTERFACES
    • Apollo x8p
    • Zoom H8
  • MICROPHONES
    • Rode NTK
    • Shure SM7B
    • Shyre SM57 Match Pair
    • Lewitt LCT 040 Match Pair
    • Zoom H8 XYH-6
    • Zoom H8 SSH-6
  • POWER CONDITION & UPS
    • 2x Radial Power-1 Conditioners
    • Furman F1000UPS
